participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, Emma is determined to achieve her dreams of becoming a lawyer despite her rural upbringing.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for a generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city. i want to be a lawyer.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and curious, Liam loves to explore the outdoors and is passionate about psychology.
participant_2.background: i am an avid kayaker. i am also a graduate student. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living.
